text: ACR Lung Cancer Screening Registry (LCSR) designed systematically audit quality interpretation screening lung CT exams. registry based ACR Lung Imaging Reporting Data System (Lung-RADS), product ACR Lung Cancer Screening Committee subgroup Lung-RADS. Lung-RADS system quality assurance tool designed standardize lung cancer screening CT reporting management recommendations, reduce confusion lung cancer screening CT interpretations facilitate outcome monitoring. what: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) dataset — src_brfss
title: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) dataset — src_brfss
text: Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System (BRFSS) nation’s premier system health-related telephone surveys collect state data U.S. residents regarding health-related risk behaviors, chronic health conditions, use preventive services. Established 1984 15 states, BRFSS now collects data 50 states well District Columbia three U.S. territories. BRFSS completes 400,000 adult interviews year, making largest continuously conducted health survey system world.

PLACES provides health data small areas across country. allows local health departments jurisdictions, regardless population size rurality, better understand burden geographic distribution health measures areas assist planning public health interventions. what: US CDC Social Vulnerability Index — src_cdc_social_vulnerability_index
title: US CDC Social Vulnerability Index — src_cdc_social_vulnerability_index
text: CDC's Social Vulnerability Index (SVI), created maintained Geospatial Research, Analysis, Services Program (GRASP), uses US Census data determine social vulnerability every county tract. index ranks county tract based upon 15 social factors including poverty, lack vehicle access, crowded housing, groups four related themes: 1) Socioeconomic, 2) Housing Composition Disability, 3) Minority Status Language, 4) Housing Transportation.

title: US CDC Social Vulnerability Index — src_cdc_social_vulnerability_index
US CDC Social Vulnerability Index — src_cdc_social_vulnerability_index
text: https://svi.cdc.gov/

title: US CDC Social Vulnerability Index — src_cdc_social_vulnerability_index
text: data.frame

title: US CDC Social Vulnerability Index — src_cdc_social_vulnerability_index
text: Theme rankings: four themes, summed percentiles variables comprising theme. ordered summed percentiles theme determine theme-specific percentile rankings. four summary theme ranking variables, detailed Data Dictionary , : Socioeconomic - RPL_THEME1 Household Composition & Disability - RPL_THEME2 Minority Status & Language - RPL_THEME3 Housing Type & Transportation - RPL_THEME4 Overall tract rankings: summed sums theme, ordered tracts, calculated overall percentile rankings. Please note; taking sum sums theme summing individual variable rankings. overall tract summary ranking variable RPL_THEM detailed documentation, see https://svi.cdc.gov/Documents/Data/2018_SVI_Data/SVI2018Documentation.pdf

title: FDA Certified Mammography Facilities Dataset — src_fda_mammography_data
text: Mammography Quality Standards Act requires mammography facilities across nation meet uniform quality standards. Congress passed law 1992 assure high-quality mammography early breast cancer detection, can lead early treatment, range treatment options, increased chances survival. law, mammography facilities must: 1) accredited FDA-approved accreditation body, 2) certified FDA, State, meeting standards, 3) undergo annual MQSA inspection, 4) prominently display certificate issued agency. facilities meeting criteria listed FDA Certified Mammography Facilities dataset
